scripts.minify_sido: mapshaper -i geoJSON/sido/TL_SCCO_CTPRVN.shp encoding=euc-kr -simplify weighted 0.15% -o format=shapefile geoJSON/sido/source.shp encoding=utf-8
scripts.minify_sigungu: mapshaper -i geoJSON/sigungu/TL_SCCO_SIG.shp encoding=euc-kr -simplify weighted 0.5% -o format=shapefile geoJSON/sigungu/source.shp encoding=utf-8
scripts.minify_dong: mapshaper -i geoJSON/dong/TL_SCCO_EMD.shp encoding=euc-kr -simplify weighted 0.05% -o format=shapefile geoJSON/dong/source.shp encoding=utf-8
scripts.minify_test: mapshaper -i geoJSON/test/test.shp encoding=utf-8 -simplify weighted 100% -o format=shapefile geoJSON/test/source.shp encoding=utf-8
scripts.allBuild: npm run minify_sido && npm run minify_sigungu && npm run minify_dong && geoJSON_build.bat
